name: line-number-adder
title: Line Number Adder
description: Add line numbers to text files with customizable formatting
content:
Overview

This application adds line numbers to text files, making it easier to reference specific lines in documents, code files, or logs.

Features

  • Automatically numbers all lines in a text file
  • Uses enumerate for efficient line processing
  • Auto-adjusts number width based on total lines
  • Preserves original text encoding

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload your text file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a new text file with line numbers prepended to each line in the format: 001: line content
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && python prod_apps_clone/python/line_number_adder.py "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
